detailedRequirements:
Cloud Hub has a Postgres database for storing data about the company's applications and the charges for those software apps. We need to increase the number of fields to store more information, and modify a couple to make them more generic. We have listed all of the new fields here:

company_apps
external_id (text), example: 1000f4422567
business_unit (text), example: Sales
license_count (integer), example: 100
is_sso (boolean)
spend_estimated (money)
start_date (date time with timezone)
supplier_name (text), example: “Salesforce"
launch_url (text), example: "http://www.salesforce.com"
source (text), example: "AP File Import"

charges
charge_type (text), examples: “AP”, “EXP"
currency (text), example: “USD"
source_charge_desc (text), example: “Slack account for remote team"
source_business_unit (text), example: Sales

Modifications:
Change source_category_id to source_category and change source_account_id to source_account. We want to make these both more generic since they might not always contain IDs. 


Requirements
1. Update dll.sql script to include these new fields and modifications
2. Update swagger and tests to include these new data points.


Reviewer Steps
1. Check 'npm run lint'
2. Check 'npm run test'
3. Verify requirements
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
1. Any additions or modifications to the code project pass on "npm run lint". Any modifications to the base project needs to pass the tests, npm run test.
2. Provide your code and documentation in a single zip file. Please include a git patch for easier integration of changes.
3. The bulk of your documentation should be in the Readme.md and you should assume that this will be open source so make sure you cover all the steps to set up,  If you have specific information that should not be included in a public readme (like links to your video) put them in a file called submission.txt and they will be omitted from the project if it is open sourced.
